metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Shares the quirky, character-driven humor of shows like 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny,' with a focus on dysfunctional family dynamics.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: Similar to 'Scrubs' in its ensemble cast, clever writing, and meta-humor, but set in a community college.

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: Blends animation with dark humor and explores complex themes, appealing to fans of 'Rick and Morty' and 'Futurama' with a deeper emotional core.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: A philosophical comedy with a sci-fi twist, exploring morality and the afterlife, which might appeal to fans of 'Ted Lasso' and 'Futurama'.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: A hilarious mockumentary about vampire roommates, blending comedy with supernatural elements, similar to the absurd humor in 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Features an optimistic tone and ensemble cast akin to 'Ted Lasso,' with a focus on workplace dynamics and quirky characters.

metas.name: The Office (US)
metas.description: Another workplace comedy with a mockumentary style, offering relatable characters and awkward situations, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: A police procedural comedy with a strong ensemble cast and heartwarming moments, sharing the comedic sensibility of 'Scrubs' and 'Parks and Recreation'.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: A mind-bending sci-fi miniseries with dark humor and complex characters, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: A complex German sci-fi thriller with time travel and interconnected mysteries, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: An anthology series exploring the dark side of technology, offering thought-provoking and unsettling stories similar to 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: A suspenseful sci-fi thriller with a unique premise and unsettling atmosphere, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: A psychological thriller with a focus on hacking and social commentary, offering a dark and suspenseful narrative similar to 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: A crime drama focusing on the early days of criminal profiling, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: A British police procedural known for its complex plots and moral ambiguity, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Bodyguard
metas.description: A tense political thriller with strong performances and high stakes, similar to 'The Night Manager' in its suspense and intrigue.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: A modern take on the classic detective, with complex mysteries and strong character dynamics, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'HIS & HERS'.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: British comedy with awkward situations and relatable characters, akin to 'Brassic' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: After Life
metas.description: Darkly comedic drama about grief and finding hope, with a similar blend of humor and emotion found in 'Brassic' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Fleabag
metas.description: British comedy-drama with a witty and complex female lead, known for its sharp writing and emotional depth, similar to 'Brassic' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Attack on Titan
metas.description: A dark and intense anime with action, mystery, and complex themes, sharing similarities with 'One-Punch Man' and 'Stranger Things', but with a more serious tone.

metas.name: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
metas.description: Visually stunning anime with a dark and gritty cyberpunk world, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: An animated superhero series with mature themes and surprising violence, similar to 'One-Punch Man' but with a more dramatic storyline.

metas.name: Arcane
metas.description: A visually stunning animated series based on the League of Legends universe, with a compelling story and strong characters, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: The Umbrella Academy
metas.description: A superhero series with a dysfunctional family dynamic and a quirky sense of humor, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: A quirky and bizarre sci-fi detective show with interconnected mysteries and a unique sense of humor, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Futurama'.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: A comedic sci-fi series about the afterlife in a digital world, appealing to fans of 'Futurama' and 'The Good Place'.

metas.name: Altered Carbon
metas.description: A cyberpunk science fiction series with a dark and gritty atmosphere, appealing to fans of 'Fallout' and 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Orphan Black
metas.description: A sci-fi thriller with a complex mystery and strong performances, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: A hard science fiction series with realistic space battles and political intrigue, appealing to fans of 'Foundation' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: Star Trek: Lower Decks
metas.description: An animated comedy set in the Star Trek universe, offering a humorous take on the franchise similar to 'Futurama'.

metas.name: Warehouse 13
metas.description: A light-hearted sci-fi series with a focus on strange artifacts and quirky characters, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Eureka
metas.description: A sci-fi series set in a town populated by geniuses and their inventions, offering a blend of humor and adventure similar to 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Travelers
metas.description: A science fiction series about time travelers on a mission to save humanity, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Babylon 5
metas.description: A classic science fiction series with complex characters and a compelling overarching story, appealing to fans of 'Foundation' and 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: A spy thriller with a science fiction twist, exploring parallel universes and moral dilemmas, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'Severance'.

metas.name: Happy!
metas.description: A dark comedy with graphic violence and a bizarre premise, similar to the edgy humor found in 'Brassic' and 'It's Always Sunny'.

metas.name: Avenue 5
metas.description: A satirical science fiction comedy set on a space cruise ship, appealing to fans of 'Futurama' and 'Veep' (political satire).

metas.name: Extraordinary
metas.description: A British comedy about a young woman living in a world where everyone develops superpowers, except her, reminiscent of 'Brassic' in its humor and setting.

metas.name: Beef
metas.description: A dark comedy-drama about two strangers who become embroiled in a road rage incident that escalates into a prolonged feud, similar to the conflict-driven plots of 'Brassic'.
